<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/flows"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of all flow definitions

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"flowType","in":"query","description":"Filter by flow type","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["AUTHENTICATION","REGISTRATION"]}},{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"Maximum number of flows to return","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100,"default":30}},{"name":"offset","in":"query","description":"Number of flows to skip","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
